 2012-14822012-11-02,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment to the position of special advisor to the Prime Minister, ROBERT WATT, of North Vancouver, British Columbia, as a member of the Advisory Committee on Vice-Regal Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, on a part-time basis, effective November 2, 2012.
